```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame([('falcon', 'bird', 389.0),
...                    ('parrot', 'bird', 24.0),
...                    ('lion', 'mammal', 80.5),
...                    ('monkey', 'mammal', np.nan)],
...                   columns=['name', 'class', 'max_speed'],
...                   index=[0, 2, 3, 1])
>>> df
 name   class  max_speed
0  falcon    bird      389.0
2  parrot    bird       24.0
3    lion  mammal       80.5
1  monkey  mammal        NaN 
```

```py
>>> df.take([0, 3])
 name   class  max_speed
0  falcon    bird      389.0
1  monkey  mammal        NaN 
```

```py
>>> df.take([1, 2], axis=1)
 class  max_speed
0    bird      389.0
2    bird       24.0
3  mammal       80.5
1  mammal        NaN 
```

```py
>>> df.take([-1, -2])
 name   class  max_speed
1  monkey  mammal        NaN
3    lion  mammal       80.5 
```
